text.section: A person who violates any provision of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $500 or imprisonment not exceeding 6 months or both.

section.section: The Board may impose on a person who violates any provision of this subtitle a penalty not exceeding $5,000 for each violation.
The Board shall pay any penalty collected under this subsection into the General Fund of the State.
